This guide is designed for a Non-Resident Indian (NRI) who is 18 years or older and applying for a new Aadhaar (Enrolment) or updating an existing one, using a valid Indian Passport as primary proof of identity and address.

GUIDE TO COMPLETING FORM 2 (NRI AADHAAR ENROLMENT/UPDATE)

General Instructions: * Use BLOCK LETTERS (uppercase) only. * Ensure all information entered is accurate and matches the details on your supporting documents (primarily your Valid Indian Passport). * The fields pertaining to the Verifier/Enrolment Operator at the bottom of the form will be filled out by the official at the Enrolment Centre.

Step 1: Section 1 – Purpose

This section determines whether you are applying for a new Aadhaar or modifying an existing one.

| Field | Requirement | Guidance | | :--- | :--- | :--- | | Enrolment | Checkbox | Check this box if you are applying for an Aadhaar number for the first time. | | Update | Checkbox | Check this box if you already have an Aadhaar number and need to change demographic or biometric information. |

Step 2: Section 2 – Demographic Information

Fill this section only if you are enrolling for the first time, or if you are updating any of the following fields (Name, Gender, DOB).

| Field | Requirement | Guidance | | :--- | :--- | :--- | | (a) Name | Write the full name of the applicant. | Write your name exactly as it appears on your Valid Indian Passport. | | (b) Gender | Check one box. | Select Male, Female, or Third gender/Transgender. | | (c) Date of Birth | Enter the date (DDMMYYYY). | Enter the Date of Birth exactly as it appears on your Valid Indian Passport. | | Verified/Declared/Approximate | Check one status box. | Since you are providing a Valid Indian Passport, check the Verified box. | | (d) Email | Enter the email address (Mandatory). | Provide a current and valid email address. | | (e) Mobile number | Enter the 10-digit mobile number. | Provide a current mobile number (highly recommended). |

Step 3: Section 3 – Basis of Enrolment/Update

This section confirms how your identity and address are being verified. For NRIs using Form 2, the standard process is Document Verification.

| Field | Requirement | Guidance | | :--- | :--- | :--- | | Document verification | Checkbox | Check this box. This confirms you are providing your valid Indian Passport for verification. (This is the standard option for NRIs using this form). | | Confirmation by Head of Family (HoF) | Checkbox | Leave this box unchecked unless you are specifically opting for HoF-based verification (in which case, Section 5 must be completed). |

Step 4: Section 4 – For Document-based Enrolment/Update

If you checked "Document verification" in Section 3, complete this section.

| Field | Requirement | Guidance | | :--- | :--- | :--- | | (a) Address | Enter the complete address. | Write the address exactly as it appears in your Valid Indian Passport. | | (b) Type of documents presented | List the documents provided. | For Form 2, the requirement is specific:
Check (i) Proof of Identity (POI): Write Valid Indian Passport
Check (ii) Proof of Address (POA): Write Valid Indian Passport
Check (iii) Proof of Date of Birth (PDB) (optional): Write Valid Indian Passport (or leave blank if DOB is covered by POI/POA). |

Step 5: Section 5 – For HoF-based Enrolment or Update (Conditional)

Skip this entire section if you completed Section 4 (Document verification). Only fill this out if you checked "Confirmation by Head of Family (HoF)" in Section 3.

| Field | Requirement | Guidance | | :--- | :--- | :--- | | (a) Details of HoF | Name and Aadhaar number. | Enter the name and 12-digit Aadhaar number of the Head of Family. | | (b) Relationship with applicant | Check the relevant box. | Check the box that describes the HoF’s relationship to the applicant (e.g., Mother, Father, Spouse). | | (b) Type of Proof of Relationship (POR) document presented | Mention the document. | List the document used to prove the relationship (e.g., Marriage Certificate, Birth Certificate). | | Signature of HoF | Signature required. | The Head of Family must sign in this box. |

Step 6: Section 6 – For Update, Additional Information (Conditional)

Skip this section if you are applying for new Enrolment. Only fill this out if you selected "Update" in Section 1.

| Field | Requirement | Guidance | | :--- | :--- | :--- | | (a) Aadhaar number of applicant | Enter the 12-digit number. | Write your existing Aadhaar number. | | (b) Information to be updated | Check the relevant boxes. | Check ONLY the fields you wish to change or update (e.g., Biometric, Name, Address, Mobile). |

Step 7: Declaration and Consent

Read the declaration points (1 through 4) carefully. By signing, you confirm that the information is correct and you consent to the processing of your data under the relevant laws.

| Field | Requirement | Guidance | | :--- | :--- | :--- | | Signature / thumb impression of applicant* | Signature/Thumbprint. | Sign or provide a thumb impression in the designated box. | | Date and time | Enter the date and time. | Write the current date (DD/MM/YYYY) and time of application. | | Signature of verifier, Name of verifier, Date and time (bottom boxes) | Leave Blank. | These fields are to be completed only by the Enrolment Official/Verifier. |

Note on Guardianship: If the applicant is a person with disability for whom a lawful guardian is appointed, the guardian must sign and present the relevant documentation.
